FOOTER.TAGLINE: Business strategy consulting, digitalization, and artificial intelligence.

HERO.TITLE: Build, transform and grow
HERO.SUBTITLE: today's and tomorrow's businesses
HERO.TEXT: ZIA COMM is a firm specialized in business strategy, digitalization, and AI integration. We help companies structure growth, optimize performance, and adopt differentiating technologies.

FOUNDER.TITLE: A vision backed by experience
FOUNDER.TEXT1: Founded by Fouzia Azmi, ZIA COMM draws on over 16 years of experience in business development, team management, digital transformation, and strategic consulting.
FOUNDER.TEXT2: Having evolved in demanding environments—retail, training, consulting, and commercial direction—Fouzia developed a unique approach: combining strategy, technology, and human intelligence to create more performant and resilient organizations.
FOUNDER.TEXT3: Today, she supports leaders, teams, and entrepreneurs in implementing efficient, automated, results-oriented systems.

STRATEGY.TITLE: Strategic clarity
STRATEGY.TEXT: We help companies define a clear, measurable direction aligned with their ambitions.

TECH.TITLE: Useful technology
TECH.TEXT: AI and automation are not gadgets: they are powerful levers to save time and boost performance.

HUMAN.TITLE: Human-centered
HUMAN.TEXT: Transformation only makes sense if it strengthens teams, skills, and internal culture.

STEP1.TITLE: Diagnosis & analysis
STEP1.TEXT: Understand your market, processes, and goals.

STEP2.TITLE: Strategy & action plan
STEP2.TEXT: Build a clear, realistic, ROI-focused roadmap.

STEP3.TITLE: Digitalization & AI
STEP3.TEXT: Implement smart tools to automate and optimize.

STEP4.TITLE: Support & skills building
STEP4.TEXT: Train, guide, and support teams through transformation.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to transform your business?
CTA.TEXT: We support you every step of your growth.

HERO.TITLE: Accelerate your commercial performance
HERO.SUBTITLE: through digital strategy & AI
HERO.TEXT: ZIA COMM supports companies and professionals in structuring, digitalizing, and automating growth.

WWD.TITLE: What we do
WWD.TEXT: At ZIA COMM, we transform companies with commercial, digital, and AI-based automation strategies grounded in experience, data, and artificial intelligence.

STRATEGY.TITLE: Tailored strategies
STRATEGY.TEXT: Market analysis, strategic positioning, and customized commercial action plan.

MARKETING.TITLE: Digital Marketing
MARKETING.TEXT: High-performing digital plans, community management, campaign optimization, and SEO.

AI.TITLE: AI Integration
AI.TEXT: Intelligent automation solutions, data analysis, and AI tools for efficiency gains.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Leadership & Expertise
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE1: In a rapidly evolving digital world, embracing AI isn’t optional—it’s essential. I help professionals transform their strategies and unlock new opportunities through clarity, courage, and intelligent innovation.
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE2: AI is not here to replace humans but to transform—learning, experimenting, and adapting are key.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Discover our customized solutions to boost your business.

ITEMS.TITLE: Business Strategy Consulting
ITEMS.INTRO: Comprehensive market analysis, strategic positioning, and tailored commercial action plans to drive growth and performance.

ITEMS.TITLE: Digital Marketing Solutions
ITEMS.INTRO: High-impact digital marketing strategies to enhance your online presence.
POINTS: Adapt strategies for B2B, B2C, and e-commerce
Deliver messages that resonate with your target audience

ITEMS.TITLE: Artificial Intelligence Integration
ITEMS.INTRO: Implement intelligent automation and AI solutions to boost efficiency.

ITEMS.TITLE: SaaS & Productivity Solutions
ITEMS.INTRO: Boost your productivity with modern SaaS tools.

ITEMS.TITLE: Process Digitalization
ITEMS.INTRO: Transform your operations with smart digital tools.

ITEMS.TITLE: Marketing & Digital Presence
ITEMS.INTRO: Maximize your market impact and online visibility.

TRAINING.TITLE: Artificial Intelligence Training
TRAINING.SUBTITLE: Practical, comprehensive training to integrate AI into your professional daily life.

FEATURES.TITLE: Hands-on Learning
FEATURES.DESC: Interactive sessions based on real cases and modern tools to apply AI immediately.

FEATURES.TITLE: Time Efficiency
FEATURES.DESC: Automate repetitive tasks and optimize your organization to focus on value-added work.

FEATURES.TITLE: Organizational Optimization
FEATURES.DESC: Techniques to improve individual and team productivity.

FEATURES.TITLE: Data & AI Analysis
FEATURES.DESC: Use data and artificial intelligence for strategic decision-making.

FEATURES.TITLE: Tailored Strategies
FEATURES.DESC: Develop custom solutions adapted to your industry and goals.

FEATURES.TITLE: Professional Support
FEATURES.DESC: Continuous support, Q&A, and personalized guidance to integrate AI into your projects.

DETAILS_POINTS: Use advanced AI tools to automate daily tasks.
Optimize your time management and internal processes.
Analyze data to make informed decisions and boost business performance.
Create intelligent workflows to increase efficiency and reduce errors.
Develop custom strategies tailored to your industry and business goals.
Deploy digital tools to enhance customer experience and online visibility.
Understand machine learning and intelligent automation concepts, even without prior technical knowledge.
TRAINING.LOCATION: Sessions are regularly held in Rabat, in small groups to encourage interaction and hands-on learning. Pre-registration is open to secure your spot.
TRAINING.NO_TRAININGS: No scheduled trainings at the moment.

CONTACT.SUBTITLE: A question, project, collaboration? Happy to chat.
